UX and Big Data

  • 12 August, 2014 at 7pm
  • Fabrica, 40 Duke Street, Brighton, East Sussex, BN1 1AG Map
  • Track or say you're attending on Lanyrd
Add to Calendar 12 August, 2014 7pm 12 August, 2014 9:30pm 36 UX and Big Data Fabrica, 40 Duke Street, Brighton, East Sussex, BN1 1AG DD/MM/YYYY

The UX Brighton event for August will be looking at the challenges of designing for big data. Speakers and tickets will be announced in early July.

Ticket deposit

There is a Â£5 deposit for each ticket. If you would like your deposit returned, we will issue a refund as long as you attended the event and then email us a refund request within 3 days after the event. The proceeds go towards paying for the beer and venue hire, and helping fund future evening events.

Cancelling your ticket

Ticket cancellations before the event must be requested by noon Friday before the event. If you can no longer make it, let us know on Twitter or contact the event organiser/s.
